author: Reuters Editorial
title: 14 killed in bus crash involving junior hockey team in Canada - media
text:
April 7 (Reuters) - Fourteen people were killed when a bus carrying a junior hockey team collided with a semi-trailer in Saskatchewan, Canadian media reported.
Fourteen other people on the bus, which was transporting the Humboldt Broncos, were injured in the crash late on Friday and taken to hospitals throughout the Tisdale area, about 300 km north of Regina, The Canadian Press reported.
Reporting by Brendan O'Brien in Milwaukee
